ygData.subject: RE: Ore
ygData.msgSnippet: High Keep has ore. High pass hold has a forge or 3 ... From: Apple [mailto:scraple@softhome.net] Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 7:40 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
High Keep has ore.
High pass hold has a forge or 3
-----Original Message-----
From: Apple [mailto:scraple@...]
Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 7:40 AM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Ore


you can buy ore in freeport the dark elf city (if you can get in) or in
the steamfonts (the gnome newbie area) these are the only places I have
found so far
----- Original Message -----
From: Bill Hahn
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 10:48 PM
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Ore


Where can I find ore to make metal bits. I am currently in Halas and
need to find a close place.

Lwen
Half-Elf Bard
Terrew Marr
